Name: Anara (Unriddle)
Brief Description: AI research assistant platform for literature review and writing
Key Features: Referenced Q&A and summaries; visual graph of paper connections; all-in-one workspace

Name: Elicit
Brief Description: AI literature review assistant by Ought
Key Features: Semantic paper search; automated summarization; data extraction; research reports

Name: scite.ai
Key Features: Smart Citations; AI assistant; browser integrations
Pricing: Free basic features; premium plans available

Name: R Discovery
Key Features: Daily paper feed; AI chatbot; audio abstracts; 30+ language translations

Name: IRIS.ai
Brief Description: Research discovery tool with AI mapping
Key Features: Visual research maps; AI filtering; auto-summarization

Name: Paper Digest
Key Features: AI summary generator; knowledge graph updates; cross-discipline coverage
Pricing: Limited free summaries; paid plans available

Name: ChemyLane
Key Features: Chemical data aggregation; eco-toxicity scoring; visualization

Name: Research Rabbit
Key Features: Interactive paper graphs; smart recommendations; collaboration features

Name: Semantic Scholar
Key Features: Semantic search; TLDR summaries; citation analysis

Name: ChatPaper
Key Features: Daily paper updates; AI extraction; paper content chat

Name: SciSpace (Typeset)
Key Features: Chat with PDF; literature review; AI writing support

Name: Undermind
Key Features: Paper analysis; citation management; research summaries; collaboration tools
